examples: She received private tuition in French.
The course involves six hours of individual tuition per week.
El curso implica seis horas de clases individuales por semana.
I studied dance for two years under her expert tuition.
Estudié danza durante dos años bajo su experta enseñanza.
The scholarship pays the tuition fees but students still need to find money for accommodation, meals and books.
La beca paga las tasas de matrícula, pero los estudiantes aún necesitan encontrar dinero para alojamiento, comidas y libros.
